title: A32 motorway (Netherlands)
text:
The A32 motorway is a <a href="motorway">motorway</a> in the <a href="Netherlands">Netherlands</a> connecting <a href="Meppel">Meppel</a>, via <a href="Heerenveen">Heerenveen</a> to <a href="Leeuwarden">Leeuwarden</a>. No part of the motorway is subject to a <a href="European%20route">European route</a>.
Route description.
Two <a href="Navigable%20aqueduct">aqueduct</a>s are located on the motorway's route: the <a href="Leppa-Akwadukt">Leppa-Akwadukt</a> near <a href="Akkrum">Akkrum</a> and the <a href="Akwadukt%20mid-Frysl%C3%A2n">Akwadukt mid-Fryslân</a> near <a href="Grou">Grou</a>.
<a href="Traffic%20jams">Traffic jams</a> occur in <a href="rush%20hour">rush hour</a> near <a href="Interchange%20Lankhorst">Interchange Lankhorst</a>, especially in the morning rush hour.
History.
A reconstruction of interchange Lankhorst is completed in 2009. The traffic jams to the interchange were solved by extra lanes southbound on the <a href="A28%20motorway%20%28Netherlands%29">A28</a>
